scripts.watch-sass: npm run build-sass && onchange 'scss/*' -- npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js: browserify js/main.js -t brfs -t [ babelify --presets [ env stage-2 ] ] | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify js/main.js -t brfs -t [ babelify --presets [ stage-2 ] --ignore js/renderer/three.js/build/three.js ] -o dist/bundle.js -v
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-js
scripts.dev: npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-js & npm start
